graphql.query:
mutation {
   commercialProjectUpdate (
       id:3
       input: {
            name: "test"
            address_line_1: "addr 1"
            address_line_2: "addr 2"
            city: "city"
            country_code: "US"
            state_id: 1
            zip: "78000"
            first_name: "first"
            last_name: "first"
            phone: "18899985876"
            email: "first@test.com"
            company_name: "first"
            company_address: "first"
            description: "first"
            estimate_start_date: "2022-06-02"
            estimate_end_date: "2022-06-02"
            request_until: "2022-06-02"
       }   
    ){
      id
    }
}

mutation {
   commercialSettings (
       nextcloud_link: "https://nx-cooperhunter.wezom.agency"
       quote_title: "quote_title"
       quote_address_line_1: "quote_address_line_1"
       quote_address_line_2: "quote_address_line_2"
       quote_phone: "quote_phone"
       quote_email: "quote_email"
       quote_site: "quote_site"
    ){
      nextcloud_link
      quote_title
      quote_address_line_1
      quote_address_line_2
      quote_phone
      quote_email
      quote_site
    }
}

mutation {
    technicianRegister (
        country_code: "CA"

        license: "2423"

        last_name: "rubic"

    ){

        access_token

}

mutation {
   commercialProjectCreate (
       input: {
           name: "some name"
           address_line_1: "address 1"

           company_address: "company address"
           description: "description"
           estimate_start_date: "2022-08-09"
           estimate_end_date: "2022-09-09"
       }   
    ){

    }
}
